title: Wins And Looses
body: I wanna know how do i see my wins and looses, I asked my friends how do I check that and they said that they see it in top left corner after game but I don't have have that.... Do I maybe need to do something in options so I can see that?

replies.body: I haven't been able to find that stat anywhere on the client itself other than where your friends mentioned seeing it. When you're in the post-game lobby where you can chat with everyone and see their item builds, you should be able to see your total wins/losses in the upper right just under the Play button.
I know but for some reason I don't see it there...
